text:
Thank you for this help with Serena. I'm so sorry about what happened with WA. I will keep the
"bootleg" episode and hope to release someday. It's so good, and he was so kind to read the poem with me

and you were so kind to make it happen.

Lisa

Elisa New

Powell M. Cabot Professor of American Literature
Director, Poetry in America

Harvard University

148 Barker Center

12 Quincy Street

Cambridge, MA

02138
